document.full_text: camden, new jersey, forced to lay off nearly half its police force in a dramatic austerity measure at the start of the year, said on thursday it will rehire nearly a third of the officers who were let go.
document.title: camden, new jersey to hire back some laid-off police
lines_and_colors: camden, new jersey, forced to lay off nearly half its police force in a dramatic austerity measure at the start of the year, said on thursday it will rehire nearly a third of the officers who were let go.
